#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,x = 1;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i;
        cin>>n;
        int arr[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        reverse(arr,arr+n);
        cout<<"Case "<<x<<": "<<arr[0]+arr[1]+arr[2]<<endl;
        x++;
    }
    return 0;
}
